backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining Ribbit’s core state maps, data types, access control, storage mixins, and activity/like/user systems.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module transforming pond member lists by inserting creator first and recalculating memberCount.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON structure.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide describing prerequisites and steps for deploying Ribbit to the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the frontend bundle and setting metadata and root element.
frontend/scripts/combined-update.sh: Deployment script automating bindings generation, frontend build, and canister deployment with error handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application root configuring routes, layout, theme provider, and Froggy Phrase initialization.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button using useBookmarks hook to manage lily save state.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: UI component rendering a comment with avatar, metadata, content, and optional like/reply actions.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Emoji reaction bar supporting selection, hover effects, and reaction counts.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and attribution section including caffeine.ai credit.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with logo, search (desktop dropdown and mobile modal), and user avatar, handling navigation and search execution.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout wrapper with header, footer, routed content, and mobile sidebar drawer that closes on route changes.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Sidebar showing navigation links and recent activity items with active‑route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Card displaying a lily post with avatar, metadata, image, likes, views, and sharing, using multiple data-fetch hooks.
frontend/src/components/LilyImageFrame.t: Image frame that adapts layout with a blurred backdrop for non‑4:3 images and standard display for 4:3 images.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Mobile drawer wrapper for the left sidebar with scroll locking and animated overlay.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Sidebar showing pond details, stats, moderators, and join/leave controls with loading states.
frontend/src/components/PondCardJoinCont: Join button control for pond cards, handling join mutation and preventing navigation.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile header showing pond banner, profile info, and tab navigation for feed and about pages.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a post with voting, metadata, content preview, optional image, tag, and comment/view counts.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Renders a user's ribbit with avatar, timestamp, linked post title, and link to the conversation.
A popover emoji picker allowing users to select preset emojis.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Displays a threaded ribbit with avatar, timestamp, likes, and reply functionality with nesting support.
frontend/src/components/RibbitMiniBlurAv: Loads a blurred avatar placeholder that transitions to the full image once loaded, supporting avatar or img modes.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Sidebar showing trending ponds, popular tags, and recent popular posts with loading states.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Implements a full-screen mobile search modal showing trending searches or suggestions and handling query input and selection.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Renders a dropdown under a search bar with trending searches or suggestions based on the current query.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Sidebar displaying top, trending, and newest tags using reusable tag stats modules.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled wrappers around tab list and tab trigger components with underline-specific classes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs with localStorage persistence and helper functions for modifying the list.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and state across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a CSS media query matches and updates on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching and mutating pond, user, and search-related backend data via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme color variables for light/dark modes, and custom utility classes for UI components.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into short notations like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/froggyPhraseWordList.ts: Exports frog-related terms and a large word list used for Froggy Phrase generation.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Provides client-side image validation, resizing, and compression logic with GIF animation detection.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes alphanumeric pond names and returns error messages for invalid input.
frontend/src/lib/pondRank.ts: Sorts ponds by lilyCount, memberCount, and name, producing deterministic rank mappings.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily link using Web Share API or falls back to clipboard copy with toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Handles alphanumeric tag validation, normalization, and user-facing error messages.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages usernames, user IDs, Froggy Phrase generation/storage, and settings backups in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements per-lily view cooldown tracking using timestamps in localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static about page describing the platform, its features, and community guidelines with styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Lists all ponds with loading states, join controls, and rank indicators, allowing navigation to individual ponds.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Form for creating a lily with text, image, or link content, tag suggestions, validation, and image compression.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Form for creating a new pond including validation, banner and profile image upload with compression, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Post creation page supporting text, image, or link posts with pond selection, validation, and optional tag and image upload.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user's profile with avatar, stats, posts, and comments using tabs and query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the main lily feed with sorting, search handling, and loading states using sidebars and LilyCard components.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Renders a single lily post with comments, likes, views, image viewer, and ribbit creation plus view count logic.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Shows pond information including moderators, visibility, join/leave actions, and metadata.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Displays a pond’s lily feed with sorting, banners, sidebars, and loading or not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Displays a full post with comments, handles loading states, sorting, and submitting new ribbit comments.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Shows bookmarked lily posts stored locally and allows removing individual bookmarks.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Lists top, trending, and newest tags with stats and navigation, using tabs and sidebar layout.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies for a specific tag with sorting, canonical tag redirects, and subcategory listings.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Provides user account settings including username changes, avatar upload, pond management, and admin tools.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project state, architectural notes, and known issues, plus feature requests focused on removing AccessControl barriers and fixing pond creator auto-join behavior.
